00008 #include "ActivateConnectionService.h"
00009 #include "boost/bind.hpp"
00010 
00011 ActivateConnectionService::ActivateConnectionService(ros::NodeHandle& handle, NMClient* client,
00012     NMRemoteSettings* remote_settings) :
00013     m_handle(handle), m_client(client), m_remote_settings(remote_settings), connection_sub(
00014         handle.subscribe<NetworkConnections>("oryx_network_connections", 10,
00015             boost::bind(&ActivateConnectionService::connections_changed_cb, this, _1))), activate_service(
00016                 handle.advertiseService<ActivateConnection::Request, ActivateConnection::Response>("oryx_activate_network_connection",
00017                     boost::bind(&ActivateConnectionService::activate_connection_cb, this, _1, _2)))
00018 {
00019 }
00020 
00021 void ActivateConnectionService::connections_changed_cb(const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr& latest_connections)
00022 {
00023   m_latest_connections = latest_connections;
00024 }
00025 
00026 bool ActivateConnectionService::activate_connection_cb(ActivateConnection::Request& request,
00027     ActivateConnection::Response& response)
00028 {
00029   const NetworkConnections::ConstPtr connections = m_latest_connections;
00030   if (!connections) //haven't yet received any connection data
00031     return false;
00032 
00033   NMDevice * device = nm_client_get_device_by_iface(m_client, request.device_iface.c_str());
00034   if (device == NULL)
00035   {
00036     ROS_WARN("Could not find device: '%s'", request.device_iface.c_str());
00037     response.message = "Could not find device: '";
00038     response.message += request.device_iface;
00039     response.message += "'";
00040     return true;
00041   }
00042   //get the connection info for this active connection
00043   const char* path = NULL;
00044   std::vector<NetworkConnection>::const_iterator itr = connections->list.begin();
00045   for (; itr != connections->list.end(); ++itr)
00046   {
00047     if (itr->name == request.connection_name)
00048     {
00049       path = itr->path.c_str();
00050       break;
00051     }
00052   }
00053   NMConnection * connection = NULL;
00054   if (path != NULL)
00055     connection = NM_CONNECTION(nm_remote_settings_get_connection_by_path(m_remote_settings, path));
00056   if (connection == NULL)
00057   {
00058     ROS_WARN( "Could not find connection: '%s'", request.connection_name.c_str());
00059     response.message = "Could not find connection: '";
00060     response.message += request.connection_name;
00061     response.message += "'";
00062     return true;
00063   }
00064 
00065   ROS_INFO( "Activiting Connection: '%s' on %s", request.connection_name.c_str(), request.device_iface.c_str());
00066 
00067   nm_client_activate_connection(m_client, connection, device, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00068 
00069   return true;
00070 }
